name: Ancestral Legacy
text: Give to the Nico Minoru player. Forced Response: After you use Sister Grimm's “Blood Magic” ability to play a [[Spell]] event, take damage equal to the cost of that event → discard this card. [amplify]

flavor: The evil intent of Nico's ancestors has come back to haunt her.
name: Taking Back Control
text: When Revealed: Place 1 additional threat here for each [[Spell]] event in the victory display. [crisis]

flavor: “I think you've done your best to ignore me. But I will not be ignored!”
name: The One
text: [star] The One gets +1 hit point for each [[Spell]] event in the victory display. (Sister Grimm's nemesis minion.)

name: Corrupting Influence
text: When Revealed: Remove 2 [[Spell]] events in the victory display from the game. If no [[Spell]] events are removed from the game in this way, this card gains surge.
